posts.post_content:
Three of the worst T206s I've seen, really horrible condition. Pfeffer,Schulte front view and Williams. $5 shipped for all three, or trade for nearly anything. 
The good? The Schulte is a bit tougher common, and the Pfeffer has a Tolstoi back. 
The bad....Just have a look. 

Steve  
[IMG]http://www.mindspring.com/~sblackstone/f.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.mindspring.com/~sblackstone/b.jpg[/IMG]
I'll take the 3 - email sent.  thanks
for the love of God, PLEASE put more beaters on here. I love them and just missed on this one :(
